page.title: 06WHAT WE LIKE TO WEAR
page.content: Most children in our class at Bliss Charity School like to wear fashionable clothes. Most girls shop at "C & A" & "Tammy Girl". Just about all the boys shop at "Burtons" & "C & A". I like to wear trendy clothes and I get my clothes from "Chelsea Girl" & "Tammy Girl". In the fashion at the moment are flowered tops, long skirts and baggies. A couple of people don't like fashionable clothes because they think that they are too common. If you want to be in fashion for jewellery it is best to have dangling earrings and tight necklaces. If you go into "Tammy Girl" and buy a suit you will most probably be given a necklace with it. Not a lot of people like the uniform that they will have to wear next term at their comprehensive school, Campion School,Bugbrooke. At this school we do not have to wear uniform.
